title: PLAZA ORB / working class husband
description: AUTHORITY: It's a working class woman's drunk husband.

dialogueTree.title: Authority: "There! Working class drunk! You kno..."
dialogueTree.english: There! Working class drunk! You know what this means, right?
dialogueTree.polish: Proszę! Pijak z klasy robotniczej! Wiesz, co to oznacza, nie?
dialogueTree.belarusian: Калі ласка! П'яніца з рабочага класа! Ведаеш, што гэта азначае, не?

links.title: You: "Case solved!"
links.english: Case solved!
links.belarusian: Справа вырашана!

links.title: Authority: "Who's Dick Mullen now?"
links.english: Who's Dick Mullen now?
links.polish: I kto jest teraz Dickiem Mullenem?
links.belarusian: І хто цяпер Дзікам Малленам?

links.title: You: "I am."
links.english: I am.
links.belarusian: Так.

links.title: Authority: "Cracked it. All in a good day's wor..."
links.english: Cracked it. All in a good day's work.
links.polish: Rozgryzłeś to. Dzień porządnej pracy. Jak co dzień.
links.belarusian: Разгадаў гэта. Дзень добрай працы. Як кожны дзень.

links.title: You: "Wait, what did I crack exactly?"
links.english: Wait, what did I crack exactly?
links.belarusian: Чакайце, але што я ўласна разгадал?

links.title: Authority: "What do you mean *what did I crack*..."
links.english: What do you mean *what did I crack*? Look at how working class that drunk is!
links.polish: Jak to *co rozgryzłeś*? Popatrz, jak bardzo z klasy robotniczej jest ten pijus!
links.belarusian: Як гэта *што раскрыў*? Паглядзі, як вельмі з працоўнага класа гэты п'яніца!

links.title: You: "It's her husband! The missing husba..."
links.english: It's her husband! The missing husband!
links.belarusian: Гэта яе муж! Той зніклы!

links.title: Authority: "Yes. And you found him. Now go and..."
links.english: Yes. And you found him. Now go and tell the working class woman. Protect and serve, recruit!
links.polish: Tak. A ty go znalazłeś. Ruszaj powiedzieć to kobiecie z klasy robotniczej. Służyć i chronić, rekrucie!
links.belarusian: Так. А ты яго знайшоў. Ідзі скажы гэта жанчыне з працоўнага класа. Служыць і абараняць, рэкруце!

links.title: Logic: "Didn't she repeatedly tell you her..."
links.english: Didn't she repeatedly tell you her husband isn't missing though?
links.polish: Ale czy ona nie mówiła ci kilkukrotnie, że jej mąż nie zaginął?
links.belarusian: Але ці яна не казала табе некалькі разоў, што яе муж не знік?

links.title: Empathy: "But he *is* missing. You heard her,..."
links.english: But he *is* missing. You heard her, the worry in her voice.
links.polish: Ale przecież *zaginął*. Słyszałeś ją. Troskę w jej głosie.
links.belarusian: Але ж *знік*. Ты ж чуў яе. Хваляванне ў яе голасе.

links.title: You: "Give me champagne! I'm going *in*."
links.english: Give me champagne! I'm going *in*.
links.belarusian: Давайце шампанскае! *Я ўваходжу ў гэта*.

links.title: Authority: "There's no need for champagne when..."
links.english: There's no need for champagne when there's honour, recruit. Go and tell the working class woman what you found *right now*.
links.polish: Niepotrzebny szampan, kiedy mamy honor, rekrucie. *Natychmiast* idź powiedzieć tej kobiecie z klasy robotniczej o swoim odkryciu.
links.belarusian: Непатрэбнае шампанскае, калі ў нас ёсць гонар, рэкруце. *Немгненна* ідзі скажы гэтай жанчыне з рабочага класа пра сваё адкрыццё.

links.title: You: "This doesn't add up. I'm only makin..."
links.english: This doesn't add up. I'm only making a fool of myself.
links.polish: To się nie klei. Robię tylko z siebie durnia.
links.belarusian: Гэта не клеіцца. Я толькі раблю з сябе дурня.

links.title: Authority: "Do marriages make any sense? Does h..."
links.english: Do marriages make any sense? Does honour? You're not a filthy philosopher, you're an officer of law. It's time to *ace this case* and not brood over your reputation. We can deal with the perception management later.
links.polish: Czy małżeństwa mają jakikolwiek sens? A honor? Nie jesteś jakimś zapchlonym filozofem, a stróżem prawa. Czas *rozwiązać tę sprawę po mistrzowsku* i nie rozmyślać nad własną reputacją. Później pochylimy się nad odpornością na opinię innych.
links.belarusian: Ці маюць якія-небудзь сэнс шлюбы? А гонар? Ты ж не які-небудзь абапшчаны філосаф, а праваахоўнік. Час *майстэрскі вырашыць гэтую справу* і не задумвацца аб сваёй рэпутацыі. Пазней мы звернем увагу на стойкасць да меркавання іншых.

links.title: You: "This is non-sense. [Discard the tho..."
links.english: This is non-sense. [Discard the thought.]
links.belarusian: Гэта нейкі нонсенс. [Адкінь думку].

links.title: Authority: "Not honourable, recruit!! Not honou..."
links.english: Not honourable, recruit!! Not honourable at all.
links.belarusian: Неганарова, рэкруце! Вельмі неганарова.

links.title: You: "It's the future leader of a proleta..."
links.english: It's the future leader of a proletarian uprising.
links.belarusian: Гэта будучы лідар пралетарскага паўстання.

links.title: Authority: "No, it's not."
links.english: No, it's not.
links.belarusian: Не, аніяк.

links.title: You: "It's... uhm... some third option?"
links.english: It's... uhm... some third option?
links.belarusian: Ці існуе... эээ... нейкі трэці варыянт?

links.title: Authority: "No. Stop goofing around, recruit!"
links.english: No. Stop goofing around, recruit!
links.belarusian: Не! Перастань жартаваць, рэкруце!

links.title: You: "Open and shut. I don't even need to..."
links.english: Open and shut. I don't even need to think about this anymore. Goodbye. [Finish thought.]
links.polish: Sprawa otwarta, sprawa zamknięta. Nie muszę już nawet o tym myśleć. Do widzenia. [Zakończ myśl].
links.belarusian: Справа адкрыта, справа закрыта. Я больш не павінен нават пра гэта думаць. Да пабачэння.

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.english: [Discard thought.]
links.belarusian: [Адхілі думку].
